subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Dale Jarrett will apparently scale back his schedule next season, saying yesterday that he planned to do some racing in 2008.Jarrett, the 1999 Cup champion, has been mulling his future for some time and said he would reveal his plans this week. Jarrett joined Michael Waltrip’s three-car team this season and has not enjoyed the struggles that come with driving for a startup. He has failed to qualify for 10 races and is 41st in the standings.Jarrett has done some broadcast work for ESPN this season and has been well regarded in the booth, leading many to believe he is headed toward a television career.
